bibl.title: Letter from F.W. Boldridge to Henry Rose Carter, July 14, 1923

div1.p: Boldridge reports on his study of the North Carolina pond projects and suggests cutting back overgrown vegetation.

div1.head: Letter from F.W. Boldridge to Henry Rose Carter, July 14, 1923

opener.dateline:
SOUTHERN POWER COMPANY
CHARLOTTE, N.C.
ADDRESS ALL COMMUNICATIONS TO THE COMPANY,
AND IN REPLY TO THIS LETTER PLEASE REFER TO THESE INITIALS___________
7/14/23

div1.p:
This is the first opportunity
I have had to write you, so I know you
will pardon the delay. I have been very
busy since with Power Co.

I recently spent four days on the Bridgewater
Pond with Mr Gage U. S P. H. S who has been
assigned to N. C. to make a study of impounded
waters. The present conditions are about as we
found them last year. This pond seems a great
deal clearer this year than last, as the places
you recommended to be cleaned are now ok. The
area below Catawba dam is breeding A. P. and
I am going to make a careful study of several
bites that may breed later on in season, although
the pond does not seem to be breeding at all now.

I find Mr Gage a very good man to work
with, and he seems to think a great deal of you.
SOUTHERN POWER COMPANY
CHARLOTTE, N.C.
ADDRESS ALL COMMUNICATIONS TO THE COMPANY,
AND IN REPLY TO THIS LETTER PLEASE REFER TO THESE INITIALS___________
2
The Mt Island project will probably be
completed by Jan 1st and the pond flooded during
early spring. There seems to be a great deal
of second growth in some areas of pond,
and I think it advisable to cut this growth
back for a distance of about ten or fifteen
feet from white line. This cutting should be
done in fall in order that none will grow
back. I would like to have your idea on this.
Mr Sutton sent you copy letter recently concerning Camden
Court. He will advise you further as soon as
he finds out anything definite.

I received letter from Dr Moddox's attorneys
asking that I come over at once and make a
survey for them. Did he ask you to come also,
and did he ever pay you for your last survey.
Please let me hear from you at once concerning
this, and if he has not paid you I will try
SOUTHERN POWER COMPANY
CHARLOTTE, N.C.
ADDRESS ALL COMMUNICATIONS TO THE COMPANY,
AND IN REPLY TO THIS LETTER PLEASE REFER TO THESE INITIALS___________
and get it for you, I am enclosing letter, and
will appreciate if you will return to me.

Certainly hope you are enjoying best of
health, and that I may have pleasure of seeing
you in near future.

closer.seg:
P. S. Should you have to come to Camden Court I
want you to come prepared to spend at least
one day if not more with me on the Mt Island
Project
I W B
